Header.title: Welcome to Vengaivasal
Header.paragraph: Vengaivasal, which was a peaceful village till few years ago, has been urbanized . With a lot of factories and high-rise buildings, this has become yet another busy locality of Chennai's subrubs

About.paragraph: Vengaivasal is an upcoming real estate area in Chennai. Located near Medavakkam, it has made a transition from a sleepy suburb to an upcoming residential hotspot in the city. The influx of top builders is a testimony to the growth potential of the area However, there is still this beautiful pond, which is being maintained by the Panchayat union. Surrounded by the trees, with the steps down to the pond with full of fresh water, this place gives us a typical rural feel. This is one of the most beautiful surviving waterbodies of South Chennai.
Why: The Tambaram Railway Station is 8km From Here
With Good Connectivity to IT Hubs Of OMR and SEZ in Tambaram
Well Connected to All Parts Of the City Epically the Neighbouring Suburbs of Medavakkam,Kovilambakkam, Tambaram, and Sithalapakkam
Gets Water From Two Lakes Periyeri and Sitheri, Making it One Of the Most Water-Abundant Suburbs of Chennai
